body_html: Yes, it's a major reason why small unrolled LSTMs (which involve in addition to two GEMMs: a chunk into four gates, for 4 pairs of calls, five unary pointwise ops, for 5 more, and five binary pointwise ops, for another 5) are much slower than they are in Theano and TensorFlow.
body_text: Yes, it's a major reason why small unrolled LSTMs (which involve in addition to two GEMMs: a chunk into four gates, for 4 pairs of calls, five unary pointwise ops, for 5 more, and five binary pointwise ops, for another 5) are much slower than they are in Theano and TensorFlow.
body: Yes, it's a major reason why small unrolled LSTMs (which involve in addition to two GEMMs: a chunk into four gates, for 4 pairs of calls, five unary pointwise ops, for 5 more, and five binary pointwise ops, for another 5) are much slower than they are in Theano and TensorFlow.
